entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
